Package org.mongodb.morphia.converters

Defines the standard set of Converters provided by Morphia

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimpleValueConverter
    Marker interface that the TypeConverter returns simple values (int/long, string, etc...)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigDecimalConverter
    This provides a conversion to/from BigDecimal in applications using the Decimal128 type introduced in the 3.4.0 release of MongoDB.
    BooleanConverter  
    ByteConverter  
    CharacterConverter  
    CharArrayConverter  
    ClassConverter  
    Converters
    Defines a bundle of converters
    CustomConverters
    Defines a bundle of converters that will delegate to the DefaultConverters for unknown types but provides a chance to override the converter used for different types.
    DateConverter  
    DefaultConverters
    Default encoders
    DoubleConverter  
    EnumConverter  
    EnumSetConverter  
    FloatConverter  
    IdentityConverter  
    InstantConverter
    This converter will take a Instant and convert it to a java.util.Date instance.
    IntegerConverter  
    IterableConverter  
    KeyConverter  
    LocalDateConverter
    Provides a converter for LocalDate converting the value to the Date at the start of that day.
    LocalDateTimeConverter
    Provides a converter for LocalDateTime converting the value to a Date.
    LocaleConverter
    Converts a Locale to/from a valid database structure.
    LocalTimeConverter
    Provides a converter for LocalTime and convert it to its numeric form of milliseconds since midnight.
    LongConverter  
    MapOfValuesConverter  
    ObjectIdConverter
    Convert to an ObjectId from string
    SerializedObjectConverter  
    ShortConverter  
    StringConverter  
    TimestampConverter  
    TypeConverter  
    URIConverter  
    UUIDConverter
    provided by http://code.google.com/p/morphia/issues/detail?id=320
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConverterException
    Indicates an error occurred trying to convert a value.
    ConverterNotFoundException  

Package org.mongodb.morphia.converters Description

Defines the standard set of Converters provided by Morphia
